rewardf_library¶

rewardf_library.rewardf_TEMPLATE(t, track, config, **kw)[source]¶
rewardf_library.rewardf_exp_peak_SNR(t, track, config, **kw)[source]¶

Desc

rewardf_library.rewardf_exp_peak_SNR_tracklet_len(t, track, config, **kw)[source]¶

Reward function that uses time from peak SNR and the number of accumulated data points as parameters to a normal and exponential distribution.

Config:

  • sigma_t [float]: Desc
  • lambda_N [float]: Desc
